column4: Hi Guys, can anyone help me with SMTP servers thing? like where should i join to get information about subscribing with SMTP service?
what do you mean subscribing with SMTP
i want to send around 1,000 emails per day from my company. i need an SMTP server to get connected and send through it.
i have the client. i need a server to subscribe, because my ISP is blocking when i send that much amount of emails
